load in raw data

```{r}
games <- read_csv("data-raw/games.csv")

atbats <- read_csv("data-raw/atbats.csv")

pitches <- read_csv("data-raw/pitches.csv")

merged_data <- read_csv("data-clean/pitches_with_at_bats.csv")
```

understanding a single game

```{r}
atbats_one_game <- 
	atbats %>% 
	filter(g_id == games$g_id[1]) %>% 
	mutate(g_id = as.character(g_id), ab_id = as.character(ab_id)) %>% 
	select(g_id, ab_id, everything())

merged_data_one_game <- 
	merged_data %>% 
	filter(g_id == games$g_id[1]) %>% 
	mutate(g_id = as.character(g_id), ab_id = as.character(ab_id)) %>% 
	select(g_id, ab_id, everything())

pitches_one_game <- 
	pitches %>% 
	filter(ab_id %in% atbats_one_game$ab_id) %>% 
	mutate(ab_id = as.character(ab_id)) %>% 
	select(ab_id, pitch_num, everything())

merged_data_multiple_games <-
  merged_data %>%
  filter(g_id < 201500100)

merged_data_2018 <-
  merged_data %>%
  filter(g_id >= 201800000)


pitches_one_game %>% View()
```

```{r}
pitches_one_game %>% 
  count(pitch_type)

merged_data_2018 %>%
  count(p_throws)
```

creating the dataframe - add score to datatset - more seasons - batter stance - pitcher stance

```{r}
df_final <-
	merged_data %>% 
	select(g_id, ab_id, pitch_type, s_count, b_count, pitch_num, on_1b, on_2b, on_3b, pitcher_id, stand, p_throws) %>% 
	mutate(
		fastball = 
			case_when(
				is.na(pitch_type) ~ "N/A",
				pitch_type == "FF" ~ "yes",
				pitch_type == "FT" ~ "yes",
				TRUE ~ "no"
			)
	) %>% 
    mutate(
    	last_ff_not = 
    		lag(
    			case_when(
    				is.na(pitch_type) ~ "N/A",
    				pitch_type == "FF" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "FT" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "FC" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "CU" ~ "CU/SL",
    				pitch_type == "SL" ~ "CU/SL",
    				pitch_type == "CH" ~ "CH",
    				TRUE ~ "OTHER"), 1
    		)
    ) %>% 
	select(-pitch_type)

df_final <-
  df_final %>%
    mutate(fastball = ifelse(fastball == "yes", 1, 0))
```


Multi Class Dataframe

```{r}
df_multi_class <-
	merged_data_2018 %>% 
	select(g_id, ab_id, pitch_type, s_count, b_count, pitch_num, on_1b, on_2b, on_3b, pitcher_id) %>% 
	mutate(
		fastball = 
			case_when(
				is.na(pitch_type) ~ "N/A",
				pitch_type == "FF" ~ "FF",
				pitch_type == "FT" ~ "FF",
				pitch_type == "FC" ~ "FC",
				pitch_type == "CU" ~ "CU/SL",
				pitch_type == "SL" ~ "CU/SL",
				pitch_type == "CH" ~ "CH",
				TRUE ~ "other"
			)
	) %>% 
    mutate(
    	last_ff_not = 
    		lag(
    			case_when(
    				is.na(pitch_type) ~ "N/A",
    				pitch_type == "FF" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "FT" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "FC" ~ "FF",
    				pitch_type == "CU" ~ "CU/SL",
    				pitch_type == "SL" ~ "CU/SL",
    				pitch_type == "CH" ~ "CH",
    				TRUE ~ "OTHER"), 1
    		)
    ) %>% 
	select(-pitch_type)
```
